channel.title: Elukis on IMI Showtime
channel.description: Recent content in Elukis on IMI Showtime

item.title: Process
item.description: Process The foundations and content of the application were developed in close cooperation with the clinical department for language development at Europe’s leading university hospital. Based on existing analog counseling concepts, the entire process was transformed into a digital format by us. In weekly meetings with the professional staff from the language development field, the state of development was discussed and reflected upon on a weekly basis. Additional internal group meetings took place to plan workflows and optimize the application, which were relevant for the further processes.
